title: Arkansas Razorbacks
content:
Obviously this is a custom job but does anyone know what the font is based on?

Cheers  
R

comments.content: **[Forza (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160538/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Forza%20-%20Black&fid=fac881896eb3dede0ddaa901b8ccf762&fsize=60&text=ARKANSAS%20RAZORBACKS&wrap=2)** by Hoefler&Co. looks very close to not be it...
